bio:
Proudly Mexican 🇲🇽, little bit crazy loco.
• Check out my clothing brand @acapellaco
✉️ ᴊᴜᴀɴᴘᴀᴢᴜʀɪᴛᴀ@ᴡᴇᴀʀᴇᴅᴡ.ᴄᴏᴍ

list.comment: Good luck today @lelepons ! You’ve been my best friend for so long now. We’ve both seen our dreams come true, and today is a special one. Can’t believe you will perform at the Latin AMAs. Crush it lele, very proud of you.

THE GREAT WHITE SHARK 🦈 •

Words can’t explain the feeling of seeing this beautiful animal for the first time. So massive, so perfect, elegant and surprisingly merciful. •

When I realized I could go swim with them, first thing that popped in my mind was “SO DANGEROUS, SO EXTREME”. And it might be the same thing you are thinking. Reality is, it’s not. At all. •

Because of movies, sharks have been constantly portrayed as killing machines and cold blooded murderers. Which is not essentially anyone’s fault, films are meant to entertain but unfortunately this created an incorrect image of this amazing animal. People - only know what they know - and with so little information about the shark in the past, this was the only reference they could connect to him. •

Im not a scientist, but after spending 3 days in the ocean with them, talking to biologists and ocean experts, my perspective has totally changed. This creature is extremely smart. They constantly get very close and you can feel them making eye contact and just swimming away, because -like humans- they are curious. They know their pray, they don’t waste energy and don’t attack people by nature, yet then again, surfers sometimes - from below - are confused by seals. •

This experience was magical, being next to the shark, an animal that has been in this planet way more than us, makes me realize the fact that - humans - are only one more living thing in this planet.

So if you are reading this, know that a shark is your amigo. Don’t bother him tho, he will kill you, so it’s better to be friends :)
•
Pic by @agatalanz

I know.. I look like that girl from the @natgeo cover. But what really matters is that because of how the sun stroke my eyes, one is green and the other is blue 😱. Usually eye color shifts depending what you wear and the amount of light. Sometimes they are green, sometimes they are blue. First time they’re both 🚀
My Mom’s Special Sauce 🇲🇽❤️🌶 w/ @twan @directedbystro (TAG SOMEONE THAT HATES SPICY)
Planet earth is for Daisy, and every specie. Equally 🌍❤️ (TAG AN ANIMAL LOVER)
My long lost twin. You think we look alike? 😜

Colores 🍭
•
Comment your favorite color 👇🏻
Siempre bonito visitarte Colombia, no hay mejores montañas y cielos que en Bogotá 🇨🇴
Twinning and winning @andymtzurita 👯‍♀️

Absolutely WOW. First time bonding with an elephant in my life. They are so full of kindness, heart and soul. So smart and playful. Encountering these animals amaze me so much, really impressed how Mother Nature creates all of this. Really think about it, it’s nuts. The elephants design is so unique. Idk, maybe I’m just obsessed with nature 🤪. Very grateful to have met this little one. 🌍

Arrived to the Island 🌴 | What a journey! After 22 hours in high seas we see the majestic beauty. This surreal place is unbelievable, with clouds coming from the other side of the island, untouched by humans and surrounded by white sharks, it makes it one of the most dreamy places I’ve seen with my own eyes. Everyone, welcome to ISLA GUADALUPE *plays Jurassic park theme*

Shark pics + vid coming in soon 🦈
Never pull over a magician 🎩 😜 w/ @lelepons @trackabangbang (tag 3 friends)

Always smile 😄! First look to the @dolcegabbana global campaign! I’m so excited it’s out! I remember while we were shooting this I was always being serious in “model” mode but when we hugged (as cheesy as it sounds) we smiled. So cool to see they chose this one specifically to be part of the campaign. Thanks to every single one of you for believing in me and sticking through out the journey. Let’s keep climbing 🤘🏻👊🏻🇲🇽
Fiesta Saturday 💣 | by @bryant

Spent some days in the middle of the ocean with no connection at all. There is something about it. The adventure, the energy, the mystery & the experiences, that makes it my favorite place on earth. 🌊

By @arturoplataa

Quick 24 hours in New York, meeting with @imgmodels 💣. Traveling is a blessing but it can also be a challenging when it’s constant. You have to push your body and mind to make it work. With discipline and passion anything is possible. Off to LA now. 🚀

OUR FIRST SHOW EVER! If you’ve followed me a while now, you know I’m constantly seeking to get out of my comfort zone. I love learning about new things, exploring, failing and trying. Music has always been something that gave me curiosity. Building the show from scratch was a very fulfilling experience, get to know about lights, visuals, BPM, rhythm and most importantly, being able to tell a story with music. Getting the chance of having @spence and @saakmusic into this adventure helped me understand this crazy world better. I’m so thankful for having you guys on board. I’m gonna keep learning and trying new things in life. This was definitely something beautiful and fun. I take this show with me in my heart ❤️
•
NEXT CITIES!
> Medellín 3 de Noviembre. 🇨🇴
> Bogota 4 de Noviembre. 🇨🇴
> Peru 10 de Noviembre. 🇵🇪
•
🎥 @arturoplataa x @eljuanpazurita
When October finally hits you 👻 🎃 w/ @anwar (TAG 3 FRIENDS 👇🏻) ALSO WE JUST HIT 19M! 🙏🏻
Hola Perú 🇵🇪, primera vez en este bello país. El show está sold out, he comido ceviche peruano todos los días y no podría estar mas feliz! Les mando a todos muchos chapes, nos vemos el Sábado 🚀
The squad! Es un verdadero honor poder compartir momentos y charlas con estos muchachos, me encanta conocer a gente tan chida. Gracias por inspirar! 🇲🇽💪🏻
The last time I was here I was smaller than the castle. I am still smaller than the castle, not sure where I’m going. Happy Monday.

This amazing young man is Saitoti, I met him visiting the Maasai tribe in Kenya. We became friends almost instantly. You know how they say there’s people like you in other parts of the world? Well this is the case. Our energy was the same! Along our conversations we said that if he was Mexican we would be me, and If i was form Kenya I would be him, I loved that. Right after I captured this selfie as a memory. Hope to see you soon Saitoti 🇰🇪🇲🇽
Celebrando en San Miguel con la familia este bonito día. Un día donde festejamos la cultura, la gente y la historia de nuestro bello país. Viva México 🎉 🇲🇽

#LoveArmy won a GQ Award! ♥️💪🏻
-
Thank you @gqmexico for granting this to all the Love Army. It’s very powerful to see a magazine like yours supporting this type of movements. This award is for every single one of you! Proving that if people work together, we can change this world.

GQ, welcome to Love Army :)
HOLA PUEBLA 🇲🇽 🤘🏻 Siempre es bonito explorar y conocer más partes de mi bello país. | by @arturoplataa
Always happy to be home 🇲🇽 | Comment your flag 👇🏻

Since then we’ve tried to create the best content for you guys, only things that we are proud of. And today is his birthday. Thank you for always trusting my vision, you are a beast MY BOY @directedbystro ! FELIZ CUMPLEAÑOS!

Every time I meet an animal I feel so peaceful, so raw, so real, such a unique energy. I believe this world it’s meant to be shared, I believe in coexisting. All being a small piece of the puzzle of life🦒
He turned to be a dude, but hey #LoveWins ❤️🇵🇪 #chapes
